CustomField.description: Sum of all question Scores. Not visible in UI
CustomField.formula:
(First_Day_Acknowledgement_Of_Request__c +
Uses_Customers_Name__c + Confirms_correct_contact_information__c + Demonstrates_Empathy_Apology_Statements__c + Uses_Professional_Lang_Tone_On_Call__c + Avoids_Long_Pauses_Dead_Air__c + Confidence_In_Communication__c + Focus_And_Displays_Call_Control__c + Initial_Follow_Up_Call_Capture_per_Cal__c + Provided_CaseNumber_To_Client_Verbally__c + Uses_Proper_Hold_Procedures__c + Brands_Correctly_Appreciates_Client__c +
Customized_Template_If_Needed__c + Correct_Template_Chosen_For_Case__c + Acknowledges_Displays_Understands_Issue__c + Correct_Grammar_Spelling_Punctuation__c + Response_Addressed_Correct_Recipients__c +
Subject_line_accuracy__c + Avoids_Unnecessary_Repetition__c + Notes_Comments_Made_And_Actions_Taken__c + Demonstrates_Product_Knowledge__c + All_Customer_Info_Captured_Updated__c + All_Client_Emails_Answered_And_Actioned__c + Case_Tagging_Accuracy__c + Agent_Sends_Case_Number_Via_Email__c + Directed_Client_To_Online_Help_Or_LS__c + Tagged_Correct_Property__c +
Issue_Not_Resolved_FCR_Next_Steps__c + All_Steps_Are_Taken_To_Resolve__c + Refers_Transfer_To_Correct_Department__c + Final_Email_All_Issues_Addressed__c + Completed_Proper_Follow_Up_Procedure__c)
CustomField.label: Question Score Sum
